input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent Help Needed for Possible Data Breach and Slowdown

Greetings from Customer Support You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. I am contacting you regarding a suspected data breach and system slowdown. It could be due to outdated security patches or malware. Despite running antivirus and updating, the problem remains unresolved. I would be grateful for any immediate help you can offer My name is Elena Ivanova.. Could you guide me on the next steps? Thank you for your assistance.
